readme:
> Welcome!

This project was created by Sanika Deshmukh, Sara Deshmukh, Ayush Mishra, Natasha Borda, and Varshini Vishnubhotla as a part of an Accelerator program, hosted by Rutgers Univerity Mobile App Development.

> What is it?

RUPlanner is a mobile app that serves as an all-in-one day planner for Rutgers University students. 

> Features

Key features include web scraping and student account verification, as well as a scheduling chatbot and AI analysis algorithms. Designed UX/UI using Figma, and developed app using Python, Dart, and React. Used MongoDB for database, as well as implemented Google Calendar and Google Gemini APIs.
